edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.service

Interface ApodWebService


  • public interface ApodWebService
    Declares the get(String, String) Retrofit service method () for communicating with the NASA APOD web service, and defines nested classes in support of making these requests and deserializing the JSON data returned.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ApodWebService.DateJsonConverter
      Provides serialization/deserialization for using the Date (date-only) class with Gson.
      static class  ApodWebService.GetFromNasaTask
      Encapsulates the request lifecycle for the NASA APOD web service as a BaseFluentAsyncTask subclass.
      static class  ApodWebService.InstanceHolder
      Implements the initialization-on-demand holder idiom for a singleton of ApodWebService.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Call<Apod> get(String apiKey, String date)
      Constructs and returns a Call encapsulating a request to the NASA APOD web service.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @GET(value="planetary/apod")
Call<Apod> get(@Query(value="api_key")
                                             String apiKey,
                                             @Query(value="date")
                                             String date)
        Constructs and returns a Call encapsulating a request to the NASA APOD web service. Note that the implementation of this method is completed by Retrofit.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - NASA Open API key.
        date - APOD date.
        Returns:
        Call object.
